hostname.description: hostname of the machine where onomondo-eim is running on

node.description: erlang node name of the onomondo-eim instance

vsn.description: version number of the onomondo-eim instance

esipaIp.description: IP-Address where the ESipa interface is bound to

esipaPort.description: IP-Port where the ESipa interface is bound to

esipaSslCert.description: SSL certificate that is used for the ESipa interface (HTTPS)

rootCiCerts.description: List of configured eUICC root CI certificates

addInitialEimRequest.description: ASN.1 encoded eIM configuration (see also GSMA SGP.32)

eimConfigurationData.description: ASN.1 encoded eIM configuration (see also GSMA SGP.32)

counterValue.description: Initial counter value for signature generation (see also GSMA SGP.32)
